summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Quiet Housekeeper MVP - all features working perfectly. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI/UX excellent, AI chat integration with GPT-5.1 working smoothly. No critical issues found.
passed_tests: Chat with AI (GPT-5.1) and history retrieval
Dashboard page loading with greeting and cards
Energy check-in UI functionality (level selection + notes)
Tasks page - add/complete/delete tasks across categories
Chat page - send messages and receive AI responses
Routines page - create routines with multiple steps and complete
Bills page - add bills with recurring option and mark as paid
Weekly view page - summary of tasks and bills
Responsive UI elements and proper data-testid attributes
